
10010011 00001111 00010000 00000000 // Addr: 000 00000000 00000000000100000000111110010011 addi x31, x0, 0x1 
10010011 10011111 11111111 00000001 // Addr: 004 00000100 00000001111111111001111110010011 slli x31, x31, 31
